title: Draft Mode
body: Hey will there be draft mode in oceania because some people "including me" have trouble getting into the lobby faster than others trying to spam the role we want. Like if we go in ranked we get the role's we are most comfortable but there is no draft mode to practice before ranked.{{summoner:12}}

replies.body:
The reason we don't have it is because our population is too small and the queue times seen would not be "healthy". 
They do review it regularly, and hopefully with the recent growth of esports in Oceania we will soon have the population to support the same queues as our NA and EU friendos :D

Until then, pop into a 5man premade and get the role you want everytime :)
Just replace blind pick altogether no one seems to like it
